CAREER SUMMARY
May 2022 to date CEQUENS FZE Dubai
Position: Head of People & Culture
Geographical Remit: 	Egypt, UAE, KSA, Pakistan
Reporting to:		CEO
Headcount:		c 200
Industry:		IT / Digital
Responsibilities:
Develop and devise the HR strategy and agenda
Tracker and evaluate the function’s performance
Develop policies, procedures, and training material for HR
Oversee all HR initiatives, systems, and tactics
Report metrics and data to the Senior Management
Serve as the point of contact for employment relations and communicate with employees.
Supervise the delivery of the HR team and provide guidance
Delivering holistic HR support within the various functions at CEQUENS including the technical and corporate functions by leading activities including but not limited to performance management, reward, and recognition, retention, learning and development, and resource planning
Create and sustain the setting up of the HR function with a team of HRBPs to provide support across the various locations
Ensure and monitor adherence to internal policies and legal requirements
Resolve grievances and violations invoking disciplinary action as required.
Anticipate and resolve litigation risks.
Dec 2021 to May 2022 AL Fuuaim Private LLC
Position: HR Business Partner – Aftersales (Automotive Division)
Geographical Remit: 	UAE
Reporting to:		Senior HRBP
Headcount:		c 400 of 1500 total
Industry:		Automotive
Responsibilities
Act as a partner and as a trusted advisor to the senior business leaders and management
Provide professional and proactive HR holistic support for the business to formulate and implement HR strategies in response to business priorities
Align people strategy to business objectives
Advocate for employees to enable growth and success
Support the yearly budgeting process to determine headcount requirements with senior management and finance
Map talent, critical roles, and succession planning in collaboration with senior business stakeholders
Progress and sustain the finance transformation agenda
Create and devise various retention plans and approaches
Support the implementation of the Group Emiratization strategy through promoting recruitment, development, and retention
Lead and support Employee relations cases including disciplinary hearings
Act as a mediator to resolve conflicts between associates during informal stages where possible, including general complaints, grievances, or disciplinary matters
Ensure diversity aim is met
Implement and align the Group HR strategies and cyclical agenda
Implement and align to processes such as internal mobility, succession planning, talent reviews
Produce and maintain talent management information and analytics
Map talent, critical roles, and succession planning in collaboration with senior business stakeholders
Support the performance management process from objective setting, midyear, yearend review, and calibration of talent across the company
Assist Line Managers in initiating Performance Improvement Plans, coach Managers to conduct reviews, and raise separation requests when required
Produce analysis and dashboards of headcount, manpower, cost, and attrition including trends and preparing executive summaries for Senior Leaders
Support and participate in the hiring process
Nov 2019 to Dec 2021 Al Futtaim Private LLS
Position: HR Business Partner – Group Services

Reporting to:		GM HR
Headcount:	Group Services: +500 / Finance Division: +1,200 (Supported 42-75 Cost Centres)
Industry:		Corporate Departments
